ee lajjawata path wi sitinne, judawe janaya ha jerusalame purawasiyan wana api hama ya; obata wiruddha wa drohikam kala nisa oba wisin panna damanu laba, ahalapahala ha durabahara siyalu ratawala sitina sakala ishrayelwarun wana api hama ya. 8 samindanan wahansa, apa obata wiruddha wa paw kara athi nisa, apata enam, ape rajawaruntath, ape adhipathintath, ape piyawaruntath, aththe, muhuna penwannata bari lajjawa ya. 9 un wahanseta wiruddha wa apa karali gasa athi namuth, ape dewi swamin wahanse dayanwitha ya, kshamagunayen yuktha ya. 10 ape samindanan wahanseta api kikaru nowimu.

warthamanaye thiwilar riyaduru rakiyawe sita guwan niyamuwariyan dakwa meki noki siyaluwa kshethwala nirathawemin ape gawrawaniya kanthawan rata pura lowa pura nam thaba atha .owun me siyalla karanne gruhaniyaka , mawaka , birindaka , diyaniyaka yana siyalu thanathuruda adala wagakimada daramini.thawada , tharathirama kumak wuwath sama kutumbayakama wiyapahadam , ithurum ,miladiganim gruhaniya nohoth kanthawa mulikawa siduwana nisa aarthikaye siduwiya yuthu wenaskam , prayogika wisandum, pilibanda boho adahas kantha manasata tharamak wadipura daneyi, ee namuth aarthikaya meheyawimata rata baradimata sudussan therimata pawathawana chandayedi boho kanthawan thama adahas idiripath kirimata, rata palanaya kirimata , ho thamage gawrawaniya ayithiyak wana chandaya pawichchi kirimata ho dakwanne tharamaka udasina kamaki ,adu dayakathwayaki.ehi prathipalaya lesa oluwa kakkumata kottaya maru karanawa se bihiwana palakayin saha pawathina gatalu athara kisindu galapimak natha .ehew ratak kisi dinaka diyunu wanneda natha.

me athara wayasa awurudu 70 piruna pasu thawa duratath agamathi dhuraya darime adahasak thamanta nomathi bawa da li prakasha kara thibe. 1952 pebarawariyedi upan li dan 64 wana wiye pasu weyi. 1990 gananwala mul kalaye di pilikamaya thaththwayak wana limfomawa sandaha prathikara labagath li 2015 di purasthi granthiye pilikawak sandaha da prathikara laba gaththeya. 1984 patan singappuru parlimenthuwa niyojanaya karana li 2004 sita erata agamathi dhuraya darayi.
